            <entry>cahi1:data_6f5db1da20f723b5bc35a565b587412c1f41c801</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Gasohols</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gasohole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gasohols</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gasohols</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gasohols</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Gasohols</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gasoholes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the relative amounts of petrol and ethanol in gasohol. This type of fuel can power ordinary car engines and is now being used in Brazil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">car engines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ethanol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gasohol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">petrol</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die relativen Mengen des 
Treibstoffs und des Äthanols im Gasohol. Dieser Typ des 
Kraftstoffs kann gewöhnliche Automaschinen anschalten und wird jetzt 
in Brasilien verwendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les quantités 
relatives d'essence et d'éthanol en gasohol. Ce type de 
carburant peut actionner les moteurs ordinaires de voiture et 
maintenant est utilisé au Brésil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as quantidades relativas
de petrol e de ethanol no gasohol. Este tipo de combustível 
pode power os motores ordinários do carro e está sendo usado agora 
em Brasil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra gli importi relativi 
della benzina e dell'etanolo in gasohol. Questo tipo di 
combustibile può alimentare i motori ordinari dell'automobile ed ora 
sta usando nel Brasile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει σχετικά ποσά βενζίνης 
και αιθανόλης στο gasohol. Αυτός ο τύπος καυσίμων μπορεί
να τροφοδοτήσει τις συνηθισμένες μηχανές αυτοκινήτων και 
χρησιμοποιείται τώρα στη Βραζιλία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las cantidades 
relativas de gasolina y de etanol en gasohol. Este tipo de 
combustible puede accionar los motores ordinarios del coche y ahora se
está utilizando en el Brasil.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Automaschinen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Äthanol</string>
          </keyword>
